Posts.EditableText:
Do you specifically want the style Jay used?

Have you considered buttons?  (You could use an image as a button's background.)

Quest has this included, too (scroll down to Framework Icons):
http://jqueryui.com/themeroller/


```
msg("<button id='help-btn' class='ui-icon ui-state-default ui-icon ui-icon-help' style='display:none;padding:4px;' onclick=\"ASLEvent('HandleSingleCommand','help');\"></button>")
JS.eval("$('#help-btn').insertAfter($('#txtCommandDiv')).show()")
```

Posts.EditableText: Dcoder, In the "User Interface Initialisation" script: ``` JS.setCommands ("Dcoder") // The id will be 'verblink' + your word in lower case JS.eval("$('#verblinkdcoder').html(\"\");") ``` ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/39151306-721dfe18-470a-11e8-9b20-230aa2e24633.png) --- It will still send the word you initially set up as the command. So, this would actually cause the player to jump when you click my image: ``` JS.setCommands ("jump") // The id will be 'verblink' + your word in lower case JS.eval ("$('#verblinkjump').html(\"\");") ``` --- ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/39151758-c57cc2d2-470b-11e8-9d05-afe570b3d638.png) --- It replaces spaces with underscores, too. So 'Sit down' would be like this: ``` JS.setCommands ("Sit down") // The id will be 'verblink' + your word in lower case JS.eval ("$('#verblinksit_down').html(\"\");") ```
Posts.HTML:
Dcoder,

In the "User Interface Initialisation" script:

JS.setCommands ("Dcoder")
// The id will be 'verblink' + your word in lower case
JS.eval("$('#verblinkdcoder').html(\"<img src='https://i.imgur.com/d9UrZ6lb.jpg'/>\");")

It will still send the word you initially set up as the command.

So, this would actually cause the player to jump when you click my image:

JS.setCommands ("jump")
// The id will be 'verblink' + your word in lower case
JS.eval ("$('#verblinkjump').html(\"<img src='https://i.imgur.com/mBf7TBeb.png'/>\");")

It replaces spaces with underscores, too. So 'Sit down' would be like this:

JS.setCommands ("Sit down")
// The id will be 'verblink' + your word in lower case
JS.eval ("$('#verblinksit_down').html(\"<img src='https://i.imgur.com/mBf7TBeb.png'/>\");")

Posts.EditableText: To use a local image: ``` JS.setCommands ("Help") // The id will be 'verblink' + your word in lower case img = GetFileURL("b_help.png") // Image from Quest's source code JS.eval ("$('#verblinkhelp').html(\"\");") ``` --- ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/39152276-6feb8126-470d-11e8-972a-8be01b28fc5c.png)
Posts.HTML:
To use a local image:

JS.setCommands ("Help")
// The id will be 'verblink' + your word in lower case
img = GetFileURL("b_help.png") // Image from Quest's source code
JS.eval ("$('#verblinkhelp').html(\"<img src='"+img+"' title='Ask for help!'/>\");")
